entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
